title: Yasa Sardar
name: Yasa Sardar
subtitle: Software Engineer & IT Specialist - CEO of Parzand Software Company
about_text: My name is Yasa — My name is Yasa — a software engineer and IT specialist with extensive experience across multiple industries. I’ve had the opportunity to work with a range of companies, solving real-world challenges through technology. I’m also currently pursuing my degree while leading my own software company, Parzand. We specialize in building tailored software solutions for businesses of all sizes. If you're looking for a system to streamline your work, we’re ready to deliver.
